docs.title: Home
docs.text:
This hosts the English documentation for the flexcyon theme.

The site is undergoing a re-struture, some links and sites may be broken.

docs.title: Quick Links
docs.text: Here are some links you may be looking for.

docs.title: About Comments
docs.text: Comments on this website uses the GitHub discussions in the source code repository (bladeacer/flexcyon) as a back-end.
